Region Map Here is the job that interests you: Workforce Manager Posted/Updated: 10-01-2015 Brief Job Description: The Workforce Manager will successfully manage the end-2-end volunteer journey and experience across a suite of North American events, ensuring we have the right number of volunteers in the right place at the right time.
